p: As for the antidiabetic effect, S. nervosum and DMC were found to exhibit very promising activities in both in vitro and in vivo experiments. Although antidiabetes is not a curative indication of S. nervosum in traditional medicine, the pharmacological activity deserves more attention to identify the optimal dose and long-term effects in both animal and clinical studies. Further research should be performed to shed light on the clinical application of S. nervosum in the treatment of diabetes.
